segments.text: The bonus season is coming . How much of a bonus can I expect ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you will get a big bonus , because you always have high sales .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope so . I think you will get a big bonus too . Bonus depends on your performance and you worked overtime almost every day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am expecting to get the bonus . I hope we will both get the salary and bonus .
segments.speaker: S2
